anniversary.title: IMF and World Bank established
anniversary.description: The International Monetary Fund and the World Bank were officially created following the Bretton Woods Conference. These institutions were designed to rebuild the international economic system and prevent another Great Depression, fundamentally shaping global economic governance for decades to come.

app.app_title: 世界金融秩序の誕生：IMFと世界銀行の80年
app.description: 1945年に設立されたIMFと世界銀行の歴史と世界経済への影響を探る対話型タイムライン
